metadata.Title: CVE-2022-46881 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: An optimization in WebGL was incorrect in some cases, and could have led tomemory corruption and a potentially exploitable crash. *Note*: Thisadvisory was added on December 13th, 2022 after we better understood theimpact of the issue. The fix was included in the original release ofFirefox 106. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 106, Firefox ESR < 102.6,and Thunderbird < 102.6.

criterions.comment: thunderbird: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
